name: Kaizen! Five incidents later with Adam & Jerod (Ship It! #20)
summary: This is our second Kaizen episode, where Adam, Jerod &amp; Gerhard talk about changelog.com improvements since episode 10. OK, so Gerhard deleted the DNS API token. Not only did he take the time to understand how that happened, so that he could actually learn from his mistake, but now we have a system in place so that ...
